verses.verse: O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of vengeance; <S%H5360><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of vengeance, <S%H5360><s%> shine <S%H3313><s%> forth! <S%H3313><s%>
Rise <S%H5375><s%> up, O Judge <S%H8199><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> Render <S%H7725><s%> recompense <S%H1576><s%> to the proud. <S%H1343><s%>

How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> shall the wicked <S%H7563><s%> exult <S%H5937><s%>?
They pour <S%H5042><s%> forth <S%H5042><s%> [words], they speak <S%H1696><s%> arrogantly; <S%H6277><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> who do <S%H6466><s%> wickedness <S%H205><s%> vaunt <S%H559><s%> themselves.
They crush <S%H1792><s%> Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And afflict <S%H6031><s%> Thy heritage. <S%H5159><s%>
They slay <S%H2026><s%> the widow <S%H490><s%> and the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> And murder <S%H7523><s%> the orphans. <S%H3490><s%>
And they have said, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3050><s%> does not see, <S%H7200><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> does the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> pay <S%H995><s%> heed. <S%H995><s%>"
Pay <S%H995><s%> heed, <S%H995><s%> you senseless <S%H9059><s%> among the people; <S%H5971><s%> And when <S%H4970><s%> will you understand, <S%H7919><s%> stupid <S%H3684><s%> ones <S%H3684><s%>?
He who planted <S%H5193><s%> the ear, <S%H241><s%> does He not hear <S%H8085><s%>? He who formed <S%H3335><s%> the eye, <S%H5869><s%> does He not see <S%H5027><s%>?
He who chastens <S%H3256><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> will He not rebuke, <S%H3198><s%> [Even] He who teaches <S%H3925><s%> man <S%H120><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>?
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> the thoughts <S%H4284><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> That they are a [mere] breath. <S%H1892><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou dost chasten, <S%H3256><s%> O Lord, <S%H3050><s%> And dost teach <S%H3925><s%> out of Thy law; <S%H8451><s%>

That Thou mayest grant <S%H8252><s%> him relief <S%H8252><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of adversity, <S%H9563><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> a pit <S%H7845><s%> is dug <S%H3738><s%> for the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not abandon <S%H5203><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will He forsake <S%H5800><s%> His inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>
For judgment <S%H4941><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> be righteous; <S%H6664><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> will follow <S%H310><s%> it.

Who <S%H4310><s%> will stand <S%H6965><s%> up for me against <S%H5973><s%> evildoers <S%H7489><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> will take <S%H3320><s%> his stand <S%H3320><s%> for me against <S%H5973><s%> those who do <S%H6466><s%> wickedness <S%H205><s%>?

If <S%H3884><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had not been <S%H1961><s%> my help, <S%H5833><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> would soon <S%H4592><s%> have dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in [the abode of] silence. <S%H1745><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I should say, <S%H559><s%> "My foot <S%H7272><s%> has slipped, <S%H4131><s%>" Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> will hold <S%H5582><s%> me up.
When my anxious <S%H8312><s%> thoughts <S%H8312><s%> multiply <S%H7230><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me, Thy consolations <S%H8575><s%> delight <S%H8173><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Can a throne <S%H3678><s%> of destruction <S%H1942><s%> be allied <S%H2266><s%> with Thee, One which devises <S%H3335><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%> by decree <S%H2706><s%>?

They band <S%H9075><s%> themselves together <S%H1413><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> And condemn <S%H7561><s%> the innocent <S%H9345><s%> to death. <S%H1818><s%>
But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> my stronghold, <S%H4869><s%> And my God <S%H430><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my refuge. <S%H4268><s%>

And He has brought <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> their wickedness <S%H205><s%> upon them, And will destroy <S%H6789><s%> them in their evil; <S%H7451><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> will destroy <S%H6789><s%> them.
